mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hewes, David T. to Pierpont, Francis Harrison
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hewes, David T.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov FH Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Apl 3 1862. By Telegraph from Camp Elkwater 3 1862. For the constitution three forty six 346 against nine 9 Emancipation two eighty six 286 against twenty three 23 D.T. Hewes Col 3rd Regt Va Vols 15D50pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Hewes, David T.
Camp Elkwater
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
